message: I'm writing more and more reStructuredText and i've got the vst plugin install which gives some syntax formatting and some export options, and a couple convenience functions. However something about it is breaking the ability to do <tab>*<space>list item<CR> and have the * continue as a comment char and build a bulleted list  - this is one of the things that is frustrating about vim, trying to find out what is causing a change
I think it might be related to formatlistpat, but I'm not seeing any references yet to that in the vst plugin, but maybe there are other plugins that are kicking in when ft=rst
